problems.title: Find Sum of Array using Divide and Conquer
problems.description:
Problem Statement

You are given an array of N integers.
Find the sum of all elements using Divide and Conquer approach.
Divide array into two halves, find sum of each half recursively, return total sum.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5
1 2 3 4 5

Sample Output
15

Explanation:
Sum = 1 + 2 + 3 + 4 + 5 = 15
